TopicTitle: Planet Textures cause drastic drop in FPS

Articles.Content:
Title explains it all. I am running Ubuntu on a late 2013 MacbookPro. Before installing KSP on Ubuntu, I was using OSX and did not experience the problem.

The problem is: When in orbit of a body, if the body is in view...the framerate drops drastically.

The MacbookPro is running the integrated Intel GPU with a GB of RAM and i just installed 1.0.7 version of the linux intel drivers. Anyone have an idea what's going on?

Thanks all!

edit: Framrate drops from 60 (where I have it capped) to ~5fps when in LKO.
